Cinolo Vernengo, R
metadata.dc:description: A study carried out with 250 young students showed how much alcohol is socially accepted during young people parties. Significant differences were observed according to kind of alcoholic beverage, specially greater alcohol consumption of those of less alcoholic graduation.
metadata.dc:title: Bebida social y fiesta de adolescentes.
[Social drinking and adolescent parties].
metadata.dc:publisher: Acta psiquiatrica y psicologica de America latina
